> 
> I'll add that for next tournament. Do you think it should be a wing limit, or just a general, no wing spamming rule?

I kind of like the idea of imposing an arbitrarily difficult restriction on wings like...

- No more than four controllable aero surfaces (as well as no rcs, reaction wheels)
- Cannot use more than one of any given wing part

Or, we could make this into an unpowered glider fight and have the planes start from launch clamps edited to 5000m or something. This would punish designs that bleed off speed to make insanely tight turns.
